name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SAP Enable Now, desktop application recorder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for creating and playing in-app help content for web-based applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to record help content for web-based applications that can be used for software training or as in-app help content in SAP Companion for desktop.
